name: Atlanta to Denver Full Flight on an Updated Boeing 757
description:
Thanks for watching this Full Flight Experience!  This is the second in a series of four flight experience videos relating to my trip to Denver with my wife Beth.  We went for our wedding anniversary and, until the day of our trip, she had no idea where we were going; it was a complete surprise!  Follow our journey from our home airport in Louisville, Kentucky to Denver, Colorado and back over an exciting weekend of travel and exploration!

This second video covers our flight aboard a recently updated Boeing 757 from Atlanta to Denver.  We had pleasant weather for our morning flight, with some great views of the high plains and Front Range before touching down in Colorado.  

Thanks again for watching, and enjoy!

Flight Information
Airline: Delta Air Lines
Flight Number: DAL1382
Date of Flight: Thursday, October 29, 2015

Origin Airport: Atlanta Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport (KATL/ATL)
Destination Airport: Denver International Airport (KDEN/DEN)

Departing Gate: B7
Scheduled Departure: 09:40 EDT
Actual Departure from Gate: 09:39 EDT
Takeoff Runway and Time: RWY 26L / 09:54 EDT
Landing Runway and Time: RWY 16L / 10:39 MDT
Scheduled Arrival: 11:04 MDT
Actual Arrival at Gate: 10:54 EDT
Arriving Gate: C40

Aircraft Information
Type: Boeing 757-232
Registration: N685DA
Aircraft Delivery / Update: March 1995 / March 2015
Engines: 2x Pratt & Whitney 2037
Seat/s: 31A & 31B

Video Highlights and Timeline
01:40 - OUTBOUND TAXI
04:20 - TAKEOFF
10:30 - SHORT FINAL AND LANDING

Technical Specs
Camera: Nikon D3200 with 18-55mm lenses

A big thanks to my wife Beth as my assistant (and often primary) cameraperson throughout the journey!

This video is the sole property of www.milesbyfoot.com.  Any unauthorized use of the video or audio content from this video is prohibited.  If you'd like to use any portion of this video, please e-mail me at milesbyfoot@gmail.com and I'll be happy work with you!
